reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731: APPLICATION FOR PAYMENT OF A GRANT
reg_info.reg_name_text: APPLICATION FOR PAYMENT OF A GRANT
reg_info.act_under: Protection of Livestock and Poultry from Dogs Act

content.content: 1. Where a municipality has paid an award for damage ascertained under section 4 of the Act respecting damage by wolves, the municipality may apply in Form 1 to the Commissioner for a grant respecting such damage. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, s. 1. Maximum Amounts of Compensation
content.raw_html:
1. Where a municipality has paid an award for damage ascertained under section 4 of the Act respecting damage by wolves, the municipality may apply in Form 1 to the Commissioner for a grant respecting such damage. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, s. 1.

Maximum Amounts of Compensation

content.content: 2. (1) The following amounts are prescribed as maximum amounts for the purposes of subsection 4 (14) of the Act: 1. For a head of cattle, $1,000. 2. For a fur-bearing animal, $100. 3. For a goat, $200. 4. For a horse, $500. 5. For poultry of one owner killed or injured in any year, $1,000. 6. For a rabbit, $20 and for all rabbits of one owner killed or injured in any year, $1,000. 7. For a head of sheep, $200. 8. For a head of swine, $200. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, s. 2 (1). (2) The following amounts are prescribed as maximum amounts for the purposes of subsection 17 (3) of the Act: 1. For honey bees, $35. 2. For hive equipment, $75. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, s. 2 (2). FORM 1   APPLICATION FOR GRANT Livestock, Poultry and Honey Bee Protection Act    R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, Form 1. Français
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The following amounts are prescribed as maximum amounts for the purposes of subsection 4 (14) of the Act:

1. For a head of cattle, $1,000.

2. For a fur-bearing animal, $100.

3. For a goat, $200.

4. For a horse, $500.

5. For poultry of one owner killed or injured in any year, $1,000.

6. For a rabbit, $20 and for all rabbits of one owner killed or injured in any year, $1,000.

7. For a head of sheep, $200.

8. For a head of swine, $200. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, s. 2 (1).

(2) The following amounts are prescribed as maximum amounts for the purposes of subsection 17 (3) of the Act:

1. For honey bees, $35.

2. For hive equipment, $75. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, s. 2 (2).

FORM 1
APPLICATION FOR GRANT

Livestock, Poultry and Honey Bee Protection Act

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 731, Form 1.

Français
